EmailTemplate.subject: CONNECT NOW! Honeywell Brings Broadband to Helicopters
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Honeywell: Your One-Stop Connectivity Shop
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Honeywell is the trusted name and one-stop shop for your connectivity needs. From hardware to services, airtime to apps, solutions to support, Honeywell is networking the skies, bringing high-speed, reliable, secure connectivity to operators worldwide.
Now, Honeywell and our channel partner network are making your upgrade experience even easier. For a limited time and quantities, Honeywell is offering operators a 25 percent discount on its Aspire 200 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/aspire-200]]> Satellite Communications hardware package when combined with our GoDirect Cabin Connectivity <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/cabin-connectivity]]> services*. This combination means no more Wi-Fi dead zones, dropped calls or excessive buffering! You stay connected, you accomplish your missions, and you realize added benefits wherever you fly.
As helicopter operators globally get connected – like the adventurers Bob and Steve Dengler <[[https://www.facebook.com/c150go/?ref=br_rs]]> who are completing a "connected" circumnavigation in their Honeywell-equipped Bell 429 – they are experiencing sustained communications, data speeds and throughput previously not available in helicopters.
Contact us <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Aspire200_Helicopters.html]]> now as this deal won’t last! And be on the lookout for information about Connected Helicopter demos in your region!
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Aspire200_Helicopters.html]]>
(*Must purchase equipment through an authorized dealer and take delivery in 2017; pricing does not apply to nor include the cost of any Supplement Type Certification, kit, or labor associated with the installation; Must, at the time of equipment purchase, also sign up via subscription direct with Honeywell for its GoDirect Cabin Connectivity Services’ L-Band SwiftBroadband Class 6 or 7 Background IP Plan and High Data Rate Streaming.)
